title: Betty & Veronica Double Digest #178
description: "Plant One on Me!": Pop Tate's Chok'lit Shoppe turns into a little shop of horticulture when Betty & Veronica give him a plant... and it just so happens to be a hungry one! "Production Meeting": Betty and Veronica relive their first steps... via Betty's parents' handheld video and Veronica's parents' professionally produced video! "My Lucky Boyfriend/Worse for Wear": it's two stories in one, as both Veronica and Archie offer up accounts of the same event, each from their unique points of view!
author: Mike Pellowski
